mapper.insert: INSERT INTO story (session_id, cover_img_url, title, creater, lang, created_at) VALUES (#{storyVO.sessionId}, #{storyVO.coverImg}, #{storyVO.title}, #{storyVO.creater}, #{storyVO.lang}, now())
INSERT INTO page (page_no, page_img_path, page_content, story_id, created_at, lang) VALUES (#{pageVO.pageNo}, #{pageVO.pageImg}, #{pageVO.pageContent}, #{pageVO.storyId}, now(), #{pageVO.lang})
mapper.select: SELECT id, session_id AS sessionId, cover_img_url AS coverImg, title, creater, lang, created_at AS createdAt FROM story WHERE lang = 'ko'
